name: Tweetdeck with Calluna Sans
description: Tweetdeck updated to use Calluna Sans. Use the "largest" text size for changing the font-size.
additional_info:
Install Calluna Sans, the regular size of which is available for free from the Exljbris font foundry.

http://www.exljbris.com/callunasans.html


I don't own the trademark for the typeface.
